entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:50 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow and Blowing Snow, -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 09:38 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -10.1°C
Wind: SW 55 km/h gust 70 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90 increasing to 70 gusting to 110 late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie. Amount 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 110 diminishing to 50 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie. Local blowing snow. Amount 15 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
